data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Sing Buri, Thailand, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sing Buri, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Sing Buri an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary: On average, 18 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sing Buri, Thailand.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Sing Buri do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, help 41 new simple churches start among the 209,500 people in the state of Sing Buri, Thailand. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Aheu Luang people.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sing Buri, Thailand from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Sing Buri prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Sing Buri, Thailand has a population of 209,500.

We estimate Sing Buri has 1,355 people who might know Jesus, 1,383 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 206,762 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sing Buri
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.
